.```python
# Top 10 countries by number of titles
print("Top 10 countries:")
print(df['country'].value_counts().head(10))

# Average duration (in minutes) for movies and average number of seasons for TV Shows
movie_mask = df['type'] == 'Movie'
tv_mask = df['type'] == 'TV Show'

avg_movie_duration = df.loc[movie_mask & (df['duration_unit'] == 'min'), 'duration_value'].mean()
avg_tv_seasons = df.loc[tv_mask & df['duration_unit'].isin(['Season', 'Seasons']), 'duration_value'].mean()

print("\nAverage movie duration (minutes):", round(avg_movie_duration, 2))
print("Average TV show seasons:", round(avg_tv_seasons, 2))

# Distribution of release years for movies vs TV shows (counts per year for recent years)
release_year_counts = df.groupby(['type', 'release_year']).size().unstack(fill_value=0)
print("\nRelease year counts (last 10 years):")
print(release_year_counts.loc[:, (release_year_counts.columns >= 2010)].tail(5))
```
